name: GDPR Ontology (General Data Protection Regulation)
description: PLACEHOLDER - GDPR compliance ontology covering data protection principles, lawful bases, data subject rights, controller/processor obligations, and cross-border transfer mechanisms

plannedComponents.dataProtectionPrinciples: Article 5 principles (lawfulness, purpose limitation, data minimization, etc.)
plannedComponents.lawfulBases: Article 6 lawful bases for processing (consent, contract, legal obligation, etc.)
plannedComponents.dataSubjectRights: Chapter III rights (access, rectification, erasure, portability, etc.)
plannedComponents.transferMechanisms: Cross-border transfer safeguards (SCCs, adequacy decisions, BCRs)

notes: PLACEHOLDER - Awaiting import of GDPR ontology files from GitHub/Claude. Complements MCSB for comprehensive compliance coverage.
